website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for those who don’t need a lot of storage but want a reliable, fast drive.
pros: Easy to use, even for Mac users
Quick when reading and writing between computer and drive
cons: Proprietary cable can be tricky to replace

customer_reviews.title: Slayed my music collection and then some...
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to house my music collection and spare my laptop the burden of trying to accommodate the countless songs I've downloaded over the years. It's done a great job of keeping everything safe, and there's plenty of room for all my pictures, games and other files. The transfer time is pretty good considering what I put it through. It is a rather sleek and attractive device too (if that matters to you at all). I would definitely recommend this to anyone who needed a storage solution of this nature.
customer_reviews.author: chanellie

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT WITH AN IMAC
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to run Time Machine backups for my iMac. Was hesitant at first since it was not just formatted for Apple but Windows as well. Not to worry, as soon as you plug it in your iMac will recognize the drive and will reformat it for you. Time Machine then boots up and runs automatically. Couldn't be easier to use. Not only a small form factor but it makes no noise whatsoever when doing backups. My old Toshiba would make a noticeable whirring sound. If you are looking for a backup drive for your iMac look no further, this one is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play, out of the box. Cautioned by some other reviews, we'll see how long it lasts. Our use is to back up daily a desktop that has many years accumulation of software and data, about 100 GB of space used on 2 drives and over 250,000 files. We use Acronis True Image. Initial backups took 63 minutes, or about 1.6 GB/min over a USB-2 interface. No disk chatter, Acronis does a good job of sequencing disk access and compressed data to about 65 percent of the original on average.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bolon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have the segate 500GB slim, and this thing beats it in every single aspect. It's faster: I transferred about 100GB of photos; the Segate rate was around 60MB/s and the Toshiba rate of transfer was always more than 105MB/s...Amazing. The Toshiba is smaller and looks more beaustiful. I'm returning the Segate and will get 4 of these.. Well done Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: AMA

customer_reviews.title: They were so easy to use and I also got the 2 year ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent nearly 2 years putting videos, scanning pics and putting everything into files for each family - and then gave each family an external drive so they can not only watch the other relatives now too, but it's going to be even greater when they get to pass them on to the next generation. They were so easy to use and I also got the 2 year protection to go along with them. We watched some of them on Christmas with each family, and they really loved seeing the old movies and watching pics!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grannie

customer_reviews.title: A Great External Hard Drive! Reliable, Easy to Use, and Small!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of a distrust of my computer and a need to back up the five million (or so) photos I seem to have from all of my photography. My photos barely took up a sliver of this drive. Its tiny and it fits into my hand. I've had it and used it now for two years and it is great. Never gives me any issues and always does exactly what I need. Pretty user friendly too. Great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, Slim and sturdy body, I haven't tried the software
customer_reviews.text: I really like the slim size and attractive aluminum cover of this device. It has worked well for me so far. I have used it to back up my computer the last few months. I did not use the software it comes with, I just used Windows Back-up. I also store photos on it. I think it is fast because I haven't noticed anything slow about using it, though I don't have much to compare it to. Also, mine came with a small dent, which is disappointing, but as long as it works, I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for software
customer_reviews.text: This drive is easy to use and works great as a drag-and-drop drive. Password protection worked as well. I did NOT like the NTI backup software. Couldn't get it to work AT ALL and deleted it. A word to the wise: It's a small drive and it arrived from Amazon with something else. Didn't even realize it was in the shipping box and actually THREW THE BOX OUT! When I realized what I had done, I retrieved the drive from the shipping box in the dumpster. The drive is that small--but again works great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Rift

customer_reviews.title: Good value and small size
customer_reviews.text: I got this drive when I was looking for a new 64GB USB 3.0 Flash drive, and came upon this listing for this drive. I couldn't pass up a 500GB drive this compact for less than the price of a 64GB drive. Pros: Cheaper than a thumb drive, small, bus powered, USB 3.0 (backward compatible with USB 2.0). Cons: Larger than a thumb drive, uses a harder to find MicroUSB 3.0 cable. Bottom Line: If you want a USB drive that can hold a lot of data and not break the bank, this is the drive for you.
customer_reviews.author: Noel S.

customer_reviews.title: Be carefull
customer_reviews.text: Please, please, never, never buy a product like this. The hard drive should be a trust place, where you can record any information. The only trust of this item is the password to enter in it. Very easy you can lose all the information without any possibility to recover it. I lost valuable information, hours of work trusting in this device. This is my first bad review that I made to any device. But my hope is that you be saved.
customer_reviews.author: Trucky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use as a Time Machine backup disk
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5-stars for doing exactly what I wanted it to do. I set up the disk as a time machine backup disk for my Air at the office. Plugged it in, formatted it as Mac OS (Journaled), and then went into System Prefs to set it as a Time Machine backup disk, and I was up and running. Won't hesitate to recommend it again! And I can't wait till the price drops further, as I might get a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: small, easy to install and run
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend, so limited experience with it. Did help him do the initial installation and backup, and all went smoothly. We also set it up to run automatically, and he said that it did just fine. I don't remember how long the first backup took, and wasn't there for the 2nd one, so can't speak to speed ... although it seemed much faster than my SimpleDrive that I've been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: C. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Great Drive
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase another Toshiba drive, as I had another unit that was slow as molasses, and I mean a 200GB file transfer took 2 days! But I caved and bought this one due to the great price. Thankfully this one is much faster! Same computer, same files, this drive transferred the same amount of data in just a few hours. If you're on the edge, get this drive, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Macba

customer_reviews.title: Portable, light and dependable. Not as portable as I would have liked due to the detachable cable
customer_reviews.text: Portable, light and dependable. A handy alternative to bulky external hard drives. Does not require a separate power cable like the older drive I had. My one gripe and hence not a 5 star review is that, I wish they had some sort of an opening on the edge of the drive to tuck the cable. Having to carry around the cable and remember to have it makes for the drive to be much less portable and another thing to remember. Charge me the extra $5 or $10 and add a cable retention edge Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: nycbiker

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, but not mine to keep when I retired.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a mobile backup device for my company laptop. Had it exactly one month before I retired in Nov 2013. Since it was paid for by my employer, I had to send it in with my PC and cellphone. No idea where it went, who has it, or whether it's still working. Nice unit though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This external hard drive saved me. I needed it for complete computer image backup. The software was easy to use and the drive worked exactly as advertised. I would buy a few more of these. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with my mid 2011 Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: I bought this HDD to back up my Mac Mini using the Time Machine back up software built into the Mac, and it worked great right out of the box. I just plugged it in, the Mac detected it, and I just followed the instructions on the screen. The first time backing up will take a couple of hours, so be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.author: Perez

customer_reviews.title: One of the better
customer_reviews.text: This little hard drive does what it was ment to do. The best part is you can have it automatically back up all your files in a snap. For the record hard drives should not be taken in and out of a computer everyday and is not a good idea if you plan to use it either for school or transporting files. For the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as easy as just plug in and save
customer_reviews.text: great product, easy to use, just plug in and transfer all your data. nothing negative to say about this external hard drive, I actually just bought a second one for my wife. definitely would recommend to anyone, great investment and super cheap price....
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get excited about an old school mechanical platter hard drive. This comes in a nice metal case. It does use a proprietary cable so If you lose it, you will be buying another Toshiba cable to replace it. Runs quiet, can't speak about usb3 due to my computer only being usb2. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Voltaire

customer_reviews.title: 3 Months in working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for about 3 months to run automatic Windows 7 system backups to the drive. No problems so far and the drive tested good out of the box with disk diagnostic tools. It was a good price and is very slim. The USB cable is a bit short (estimate at 1.5 feet?) so you might need a longer USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: An_Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good drive
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a better(easier) drive with a window system,With my mac had to configure different software,instructions are confusing. Drive is quite small for it's capacity-that is one of its best feature. Better instructions for Mac would let me give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: kysmet

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product but not happy with the shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item along with a larger office product and your warehouse packed it loosely and the external hard drive case was dented in. Since we had to back up right away didn't bother to return but I was a bit disappointed. Otherwise the product was easy to use and decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Germaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no issues.
customer_reviews.text: You just plug it in and it WORKS! It gets its power via the USB connection, so no separate power cord into the wall. No drivers to install. It works just like a memory stick. There's a little white LED in the corner to let you know it's operating. It's quiet and compact. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: countach2

customer_reviews.title: The blinking light says it all
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a techie. This was very simple to install and seems to be doing its job. I wish I understood, in plain people language, exactly what is going on. Since I don't, and it tells me that it is doing a backup, I have to assume that all is well.
customer_reviews.author: JeanieD

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Canvio 500 Slim Portable External Harddrive
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with prompt shipping, two days earlier than expected. Came brand new and in perfect conditions. No problems aside from the fact that it didn't move a few of my files, but really it's a great little harddrive, it doesn't take up room. Has five hundred GB on it. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: A. Bell

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: I prefer top name brands when purchasing items like these and this was a good deal for the price. I have had no prblems with this item. One suggestion I have is to have someone with experiance help you to format it as I did before you begin using it if at all possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, yet slim and sexy!
customer_reviews.text: A great portable hard disk drive, that is terrific for general file storage. I purchased it for transferring media portably and it does the job smashingly well! It is slim, lightweight and can hold up to 500GB. Is pre-formatted and works great with my 13" PowerBook pro. It has a USB 3.0 interface and works smoothly with a USB 2.0. It is small enough to fit in a shirt pocket, but I would get a protected travel case to go with it. Overall, a great investment, for a reliable portable hard disk drive.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was great! But I owned it for less than 6 months before it just stopped being recognized. I lost a lot of important files that I can't get back because this hard drive decided to randomly stop working. It's too bad.
customer_reviews.author: David AM

customer_reviews.title: Very Fine External Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: Toshiba delivers an excellent external hard drive that was easy to use and integrate into my Apple computer. I am sure that PC users will have the same great experience. Hard drives are becoming much larger and the prices are pretty good these days.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lipson

customer_reviews.title: Very small and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this drive is its tiny footprint...the size of a deck of cards though much thinner. I am using it for backup for my MacBook, and it works flawlessly. If you wanted a drive to travel with, this would be perfect for that since it is so small.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Great Drive !
customer_reviews.text: This drive is perfect for backing up my computer. It has built in software that does the backup, which is great - a plug and play. This was such a great deal, I bought one for my home computer and one for our business computer. I highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Santa Cruz Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Amazing External Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this HD. Very light, and ultra portable. I partitioned it using disk utility on my mac, so now I have it split into two 250GB HD, one for each of my computers. The sync speeds are pretty quick, though may want to upgrade the USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: primetime

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but won't work with Xbox 360
customer_reviews.text: My bad. I didn't read up on this well enough to know that it wouldn't work right with the Xbox 360. You have to buy Xbox's hard drive. Otherwise, this is a great little hard drive for the price and I'd consider keeping it for other uses, like storing documents and pictures.
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!!!
customer_reviews.text: September will have had it 1 year. Only use it for backup. Today starts clicking and does not show any usable space in Windows Explorer. Has been sitting here for an hour running CHKDSK. Guess what????........The one I replace it with WON'T BE A TOSHIBA!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Hard I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: It is great product, I love it. Sure the capacity is not 1 Tb, but still the product is awesome. Shipped fast, in excellent condition, like I purchased in the store (with warranty). I strongly recommend that product to my all friends :).
customer_reviews.author: Abror B. Zaynutdinov

customer_reviews.title: Not for the average MAC user
customer_reviews.text: Its not MAC compatible if you dont know how to format it. I had to have a friend format this before I could use it. If you dont have a computer savvy and tech guru at hand... dont get this. I almost returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Swaha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like the thin shape of this external hard drive and it's silver appearance. Goes well with my Mac computer and exterior disk drive. I've had no problems with it, and I'm considering buying another one for a different computer.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyJ

customer_reviews.title: Using on Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use on Wii U. As a note, I also purchased a Y-cable USB adapter, since this is USB powered, I wanted to make sure enough juice was going from the Wii U to the Hard Drive. Nintendo does not recommend USB powered drives. Everything is working great, and this is VERY fast for what I what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this sleek little hard drive. Loaded all of my photos onto it and still have tons of space. Will be using it very often and now I can clear stuff off my laptop and have it running smoother.
customer_reviews.author: natalie jean

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my BFF for her birthday, as she wanted one. She loves it. It's a clever looking small drive, which is plug and play. Worked easily with my mac and her Windows based computer. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ally Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect and use
customer_reviews.text: Works great and still going strong after several years of use. Connects fast to my Macbook Pro and I have no complaints, other than the included USB cable is really (too) short, thus 1 star off.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy G

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this external HDD a year or two ago. Up to this point, I have never had any issues with it. The transfer speeds are nice and I love the slim form factor. Therefore, this is currently my primary backup HDD.
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: Small form factor
customer_reviews.text: I needed something small but at least half a terabyte and this is it. Seems to be fast enough but does have an unusual connector on the drive itself. Connects to standard USB on the computer though. Fits in the palm of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Scouter5446

customer_reviews.title: NOT USABLE FOR PS3
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with with my PS3. It will not run when connected to the PS3, tried with FAT and NTFS format. Otherwise it works fine with my other computers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it needs to do. And maybe it's just me, but the picture kind of understates how small it is. It's barely bigger then my iPhone. I didn't bother with the software because how hard is it to drag something from one folder to another? The cord is kinda short, but that wasn't really a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Heleen W.

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Canvio 500 GB Slim Portable External Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: Works very well as a PC back up or private financial storage, and program transfers are easy from one old PC to a new one. Better than I expected and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: preacherman

customer_reviews.title: Very neat
customer_reviews.text: It's a very attractive compact unit - kind of black brushed metal look to it. Also very light and portable. No complaints about functionality. It appears to store my data as desired.
customer_reviews.author: ChillKodama

customer_reviews.title: Poor Support
customer_reviews.text: Software was not recognized on Windows 7 HP desktop. The Toshiba website was useless for this model. It turns out a high capacity thumb drive rather than the hard drive would have been a better option. OK fpr backing up files but not as a restart for a crashed system..
customer_reviews.author: John LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. I use it for backups so im not ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. I use it for backups so im not concerned about speed much. It is really light.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly how it was describe. Slim and sleak. small and portable. installs software as soon as i connect the USB cord to laptop. I'm very happy with product. I would definately order this again. note: i ordered this for a 2 day shipping and it took 4 business days. So make sure your not in a real hurry to get it through mail.
customer_reviews.author: Matiana Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Looking up
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well and faster loading then I thought. Now if it passs the test of time then I will be completely satisfied. I would have no problem recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. West

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, slim, feather light and love the portability. This was for my father and it will only help him organize his word documents and family photos. I don't have any dislikes at this point.
customer_reviews.author: practical badger

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!  Reliable brand!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely priced USB hard drive, trusted brand for the product, works faster than my other drives, great software included with it. Using for MacOS.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Lavrusik

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drive on sale and wasn't expecting much but it is really fantastic. Fast, huge, very portable. The computer keeps it alive so there is no lag when saving to it or pulling files from it. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Drive
customer_reviews.text: About the size of a Wallet, not George Costanza's wallet, but the general size of one, about 1/4 inch thick. Great product. I have a Mac; hooked it up, Time Machine booted right away and took about 2 hours to fully back up my computer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Spieler

customer_reviews.title: Fast and classy
customer_reviews.text: Transferring files is done very fast. This is well built and sturdy. Looks very nice. Easy to install. I would definitely recommend this external hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. Backs everything up, comes with built in software to schedule backups. A lot smaller than I thought it would be which is nice. Doesnt overheat if left in computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something everyone should have.
customer_reviews.text: These days, an external hard drive is a necessity. This one is nice because it is small and compact and plugs into a USB port.
customer_reviews.author: joe vadalma

customer_reviews.title: Light, computer friendly and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: what else can you ask from a hard drive? this Toshiba Canvio is very light an small, and works great with my computers and blu-ray! I highly recomended.
customer_reviews.author: WorldTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Effortless setup and works seamlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Use it as backup for computer hard drive. Headline says it all. Nothing else relevant to say. Number of required words is b.s.
customer_reviews.author: K. R. Mudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek external hard drive
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very slim ultra portable fast usb 3.0 connection durable very handy sleek looking Cons: No 1 Tera Byte size available
customer_reviews.author: Gian G.

customer_reviews.title: Died after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed. Had high hopes that this would be the perfect drive for my husband to take to work, but it experienced a fatal error and died after only two weeks. Thankfully Amazon took it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabird Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Canvio 500 GB - Used Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a used Toshiba Canvio 500GB portable SSD drive. Quiet and fast and USB 3.0 compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Munoz-Caro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for a great product. I recommend it for its very small size and portability. Nice job.
customer_reviews.author: EASports

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great buy so far, I use it every day for work, and then on the weekends I strip the work data out and use it at home for moving files. Haven't had a single issue out of it. Considering a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excelent device
customer_reviews.text: Works very fast and since I didn't need lots of info, this one adjusted to my need perfectly. The cable is short, but bood enough to use it in most devices and because of that it makes it easily portable.
customer_reviews.author: FEde

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You are not going to believe how beautiful they've made it. Super compact, stylish, useful (of course). They hit the ball out of the park!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy to travel with, no AC Adaptor - Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Had it for six months now and don't have a bad thing to say about it. It travels easy - doesn't require external power, and loads fast. My one recommendation would be to avoid the clunky software. Just use it as you would a flash drive as it works better just dragging/dropping files.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieC

customer_reviews.title: Understated, elegant drive
customer_reviews.text: While "Looks" shouldn't be important, they are to me. This drive performs well in an extremely small, light, minimalist package.
customer_reviews.author: D. Engel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Received on time with no issues. Product is exactly what I was looking for and perfectly sized to be linked to my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and is reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I use mine mostly to store music files, but it has never given even the slightest issue. Works perfectly! Great size, too - is actually pretty compact compared to what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: TB in Houston, TX

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. I did plenty of research on this and other hard drives, Im very happy. Works on my Macbook Pro.
customer_reviews.author: MoonGuide

customer_reviews.title: Works great...
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I expected. Works right out of the box and hold everything I have on my laptop including lots of music and pictures.
customer_reviews.author: UnionJim

customer_reviews.title: Love the HDD
customer_reviews.text: I got it for $50. It looks great. Works at a reasonable speed. Works very fast when used with a USB 3.0 port. It does not make noise. It does get slightly warm but nothing alarming about that so far. Highly portable, can carry it inside my pocket. I love this HDD.
customer_reviews.author: Review9

customer_reviews.title: Love the small size
customer_reviews.text: Love the small size. Case is plastic, though it seems like metal. Has been completely reliable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: nice ready to use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product over a year now and it meets up to all my storage needs
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The hard drive is slim and can easily fit in any pocket - great portability. You also get optional software for protecting and encrypting files, which can be useful. Read/write speeds are also fast. The only downside is the proprietary USB cords, which is harder to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: very affordable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the holidays - very affordable, reliable, and compact. Nice spare drive that you can keep around for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: bbywu

customer_reviews.title: Bad input connection
customer_reviews.text: Only used this a few times and the input got to where I have keep unplugging it and plugging it back in to get it to work. No abuse on my end. Just a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Works great with my MacBook Pro. It is easily readable and compatible with an iMac especially when you work with photographs and want to edit on another computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mayte

customer_reviews.title: Small and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Working great on my Acer Aspire S7, it matches the slim design of my ultrabook and it's fast with a lot of room for pictures, music and documents.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. H. (DRH)

customer_reviews.title: Good external HDD
customer_reviews.text: I use this to both back up and transport my fairly extensive music library and it does everything I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Saul

customer_reviews.title: It is a portable Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: What more can you say then it is a portable hard drive that works at a nice price. If it last for years and years then I got what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Halbert

customer_reviews.title: Was everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product. I'm a mechanical engineering student and I am always designing using CAD software. I'm able to save everything school related all in one place and the HDD password tool gives me piece of mind if my hard drive is ever lost.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor A Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does the job,is slim,light and very functional.Took no time at alto set up and works great,very easy. Nice product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna W

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: it's compact, it looks good and it works just fine. the only complain I have is that the available space on this device is actually around 465 GB rather than 500GB as advertized .
customer_reviews.author: MD Leeds

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted. It is easy to use and works great. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and smaller than i expected. The outside of it feels a little weird because of the vertical graining, but still it looks okay.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnK

customer_reviews.title: Super Slim
customer_reviews.text: Super Slim, i love it!!! Just i wanted delicate, slim, fast. Realy i like this external hard drive toshiba 500gb
customer_reviews.author: Yaindry

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for techie boyfriend who downloads every song ever written. He wanted the portability without the bulk. Arrived on time and was very compact like the size of android phone. He is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: works as described, have it hooked up to a Wii as external hard drive and so far it is working flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hall

customer_reviews.title: What a deal...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to have found this external hard drive which is so slim and compact. I have been shopping for one for a while now but the price of this external hard drive was unbelievable. Other models cost $20.00 or more for the same storage capacity. Amazon, I am a new and very satisfied customer. Thanks again!!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: user unfriendly and terrible tech support
customer_reviews.text: bought after seeing decent reviews on CNET. instruction is poor and hard to understand the settings on screen. called tech support in phillipines? 2 out 3 person i talked to claim they dont provide help on installation and use, they just handle claims ??? returning this promptly. such a disgrace to toshiba name. toshiba should sell the business if this is not their core and they are not committed to its support
customer_reviews.author: jwsc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good and is as fast as I need. I use it as a backup drive.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Great item, got it on sale
customer_reviews.text: wicked cool! lots of space love the sleekness to it. Very small and thin. Easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and small
customer_reviews.text: rec'd my hard drive quickly and was smaller than i thought it would be, which is awesome. Works great so far. no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Guamchic6

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: small, easy to use. I have 3 of them and they are all fine.
customer_reviews.author: mark k allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money! Sleek, light-weight, and easy to use. Purchased this item to use with my MacBook's Time Machine backup. All I had to do was plug the USB in, click to back my data up, and everything went flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price and very small size
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Plugged it in and started to back up files. I travel lots and carry it with me. As with all things, wish I had bought a terabyte. Always need more storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G Slaughter

product_meta.title: Toshiba Canvio 500 GB Slim Portable External Hard Drive - Black (HDTD105XK3D1)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackToshiba Canvio Slim Portable External Hard Drive is ideal for taking your storage on the go. This drive offers high capacity storage in a slim and sleek brushed aluminum design that is a perfect companion for your Ultrabook.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


CANVIO SLIM PORTABLE EXTERNAL HARD DRIVE
HOLD EVERYTHING. CARRY NEXT TO NOTHING.
Backups and file security should never weigh on you--no matter where you go. So get the sleek, light and stylish Canvio Slim Portable External Hard Drive, and make sure your digital treasures plus peace of mind are always at hand.

SMART MOBILE STORAGE
Today's Ultrabooks and extra-light PCs can often benefit from external storage. And any PC owner should have a backup solution. The Canvio Slim Portable External Hard Drive helps out on both counts, offering a full 500GB of capacity to house your growing collection of pictures, music, home movies, video clips and important documents in one handy place.

View Larger A SLIM, STYLISH DESIGN
Did you choose your Ultrabook or laptop for its looks? Don't stop when it comes to storage. With a sleek, lightweight design, the 9mm Canvio Slim is the smallest 500GB portable drive you can buy--and one of the coolest, with a brushed aluminum finish in black or silver. It definitely keeps pace, and keeps up appearances.

SET-UP MADE SIMPLE
The Canvio Slim Portable External Hard Drive couldn't be easier to use. Just plug it in and it's ready to go--for PCs or Macs. It's USB 3.0- and USB 2.0-compatible, for speed and convenience. Plus, it comes with its own preloaded backup application*. No need to buy additional hardware or software.

BACKUPS MADE EASY
Unlike other solutions, the Canvio Slim makes it simple to back up not just files and folders, but your entire system*--or customize your backups to your exact needs. Secure your backups with password protection. Or, store on the cloud** for total assurance. Schedule automatic backups. Then stop worrying and keep pushing ahead.

TRIPLE THE ASSURANCE
Like all Toshiba products, Canvio Slim Portable External Hard Drives were designed from the ground up with your needs and imagination in mind, then tested again and again for reliability. You can count on them to perform as advertised--every time. 

*NTI Backup Now EZ software compatible with Windows OS only.
**Includes free 30-day trial of cloud back-up. Fees will apply after the 30-day trial.

See the complete lineup of Toshiba products at www.amazon.com/toshiba
feature_bullets: PC & Mac compatible. Store and access files from PC and Mac without reformatting.
